document_data.mainbody:
Ermlaut was an inhabitant of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Ermlaut was a human man with a light skin tone, dark brown eyes, and curly blonde hair.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute menaced the city of Baldurs Gate, Ermlaut attended a performance of some showy magics by three spellslingers, on the Murls Rest plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. Ermlaut enjoyed the show but wondered whether these street mages would be better off on the battlefield, fighting the Absolute.
